message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $100 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a better deal, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $110. It's a great value, and I think you'll really enjoy it.
Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I am still only able to offer $100 for the product.

I understand that you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $105. It's a great value, and I think you'll really enjoy it.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I am still unable to go above $100 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.

I understand that you're still stuck on the price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $108. It's getting close to my minimum, but I think it's still a great value for you.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to meet my budget. However, I am still unable to go above $100 for the product. I hope we can reach a mutual agreement.
